New Records: Memphis Grizzlies had 28 stocks (steals + blocks), the most since Nov. 8, 2002.
Key Match Events: Memphis Grizzlies won 134-89 against Portland Trail Blazers.
Jaren Jackson Jr. led the scoring with 20 points.
Jake LaRavia had 18 points, four rebounds, three steals, and three blocks.
Luke Kennard achieved a career-high 11 assists in 20 minutes.
Jay Huff had six blocks and Zach Edey had four steals.
